alert.note: Alert for Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 7:47PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN DARKE AND SOUTHEASTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near St. Henry, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to vegetation. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Henry, Osgood, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, North Star, Rossburg, New Weston, Yorkshire, Maria Stein, Brock, Eldora Speedway, Carthagena, and Willowdell. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
